data.expected_result: The objects in the icon should be centered.
data.short_description: When on 90% Zoom (or lower EXCEPT lowest), objects in the Colorblind Mode status icons are misaligned.
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Colorblind Mode if you need to (User Settings > Appearance > Colorblind Mode). - Set yourself to Do not Disturb or Idle, or ask a friend to set their status. - Look at the status icon in the server menu list
